english.segment1: Im still stitching up the stabs you left, weaving in and out slowly. I grow accustomed to the piercing flesh, and find evil in the holy. And still, I see the line between the stars, your scars, and mine. And as this coarse thread pulls, I feel the veins of the frozen.
english.segment2: Stay in coma. Its the only defense we have left.
english.segment3: A bad decision leaves me open and Im left here shuttered for days. If I could replay the words we said, Id see you all amazed. And still its not enough  save yourself and demonize us. And as your curtain draws, they see the tears of the fallen.
english.segment4: Stay in coma. Its the only defense we have left.
english.segment5: Im not taking the fall for a spineless puppet. You play quiet, and I wont fight it.
english.segment6: Stay in coma. Its the only defense we have left.
